title: My Portfolio
description: A polished and responsive portfolio site created with Vite, React, and Tailwind CSS. Designed to effectively present my web development skills, project work, and career milestones.

title: Static Portfolio
description: Fully responsive personal portfolio built with HTML, CSS, and Bootstrap 5. Features a fixed navbar, smooth section scrolling, and a clean, mobile-friendly design showcasing projects and skills.

title: E-commerce API Documentation
description: Dynamic system with routes for order processing, real-time inventory updates, and secure authentication. Supports automated order reporting and product management. API documented publicly with Postman.

title: E-commerce App - Sole Syndicate
description: MERN E-Commerce Platform. The platform features dynamic product catalog with filtering, sorting, real-time search, seamless cart updates, secure checkout, admin dashboard with analytics, user management.

title: Static App 1- C.NOTES - Musical Instruments Store
description: C.NOTES is a modern, responsive website for a musical instruments store. It showcases new arrivals, top picks, customer feedback, promotions, and contact details, using HTML, Bootstrap 5, and custom CSS.

title: Static App 2- C.NOTES Institute
description: C.NOTES - A responsive website for a musical institute built with HTML, Bootstrap 5, and custom CSS. Features include program showcases, course categories, contact form, and a location map.

title: Fitness Tracker App
description: React-based workout tracking app with user registration, login, and session management. Authenticated users can add, update, and track workouts, view progress, and navigate smoothly between pages.

title: Airline Booking System Mockup
description: Side Project: Conceptual design showcasing an intuitive UI for flight search, seat selection, and booking confirmation, focusing on user experience and workflow efficiency.

title: Airline Booking System Prototype
description: Side Project: Interactive prototype simulating end-to-end airline booking functionalities, including flight search, reservation, payment processing, and real-time ticket management.
